description:
This exceptional performance is a cultural journey that bridges the diverse
musical landscapes of India. The fusion of Fakira's Bengal folk with the
Langas & Manganiyars' Rajasthani melodies creates a rich tapestry of sound
that celebrates the enduring beauty and cultural richness of India's heritage.

address.streetAddress: Windmills IMAGINE, No. 78, ITPL Main Road, EPIP Zone,Bangalore

name: Sanskriti Sarita - Fakira X Langas & Manganiyars

performer.description: Bringing together two bands from the cultural hubs of India, we present Fakira, the torchbearers of Bengal’s ancient folk traditions, and the Langas & Manganiyars from Rajasthan, the custodians of desert melodies. This extraordinary collaboration brings forth two distinct yet deeply rooted musical traditions, offering a unique blend of rhythm and soul.
performer.name: Fakira X Langas & Manganiyars

description:
VARI transcends cultural boundaries, inviting listeners on a global journey.
The album showcases the talents of Michael League on bass, Vivek Santosh on
keys, Pramath Kiran on percussion, Jayachandra Rao on mridangam, and Apoorva
Krishna on violin, making it a testament to the unifying power of music.

address.streetAddress: Windmills IMAGINE, No. 78, ITPL Main Road, EPIP Zone,Bangalore

name: VARI - Album Tour

performer.description: Varijashree Venugopal, celebrated as a child prodigy in Carnatic music, has unveiled her debut original album, VARI. Orchestrated by Grammy-winning Michael League of Snarky Puppy, this album blends Indian classical and folk music with global sounds, symbolizing water - the life force, forever flowing, undulating, and dancing with purity, clarity, and transparency. These qualities serve as the wellspring of inspiration for the music that emerges from the fusion of diverse musical cultures within this masterpiece.
performer.name: VARI - Album Tour

description:
Alba Armengou & Ramon Macia Duo offers a global musical journey, exploring
sounds from Cuba, Brazil, USA, Mexico, Argentina, and beyond. Their
performances are a celebration of musical diversity, blending various styles
and aesthetics that resonate deeply with the musicians.

address.streetAddress: Windmills IMAGINE, No. 78, ITPL Main Road, EPIP Zone,Bangalore

name: Armengou & Macià Duo

performer.description: Alba Armengou & Ramon Macià Duo offers a global musical journey, exploring sounds from Cuba, Brazil, USA, Mexico, Argentina, and beyond. Their performances are a celebration of musical diversity, blending various styles and aesthetics that resonate deeply with the musicians.
performer.name: Armengou & Macià Duo
